title: Eigenvalues of Schrödinger operators with complex surface potentials
abstract: We consider Schrödinger operators in R^d with complex potentials supported on a hyperplane and show that all eigenvalues lie in a disk in the complex plane with radius bounded in terms of the L^p norm of the potential with d−1
note:

Support through NSF grant DMS-1363432 is acknowledged.
